comment.author: 25695066@N00
comment._content:
This Huey helicopter (UH-1H, USAF 67-17736, c/n 9934)  was originally delivered to the US Air Force in the late-1960s.  After apparently being loaned for use by the US EPA, the helicopter would be sold to Greece.  It is currently (July 2012) operated by the Hellenic Army at their SAS (Scholi Aeroporias Stratou) training school, wearing the serial ES 830.
Here's another photo of the aircraft in the National Archives Flickr photostream:
[http://www.flickr.com/photos/usnationalarchives/7136536157/]
